mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE A_START_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE A_END_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE A_RESERVATION_DEADLINE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.A_ID, A.S_ID, S.S_COM_NAME, A.SIGUNGU_ID, G.SIGUNGU_NAME, G.SIDO_ID, D.SIDO_NAME, A.A_THEME_ID, T.A_THEME_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(A.A_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS A_START_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(A.A_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS A_END_DATE, A.A_ADDR, A.A_NAME, A.A_ONE_LINER, A.A_MIN_PEOPLE, A.A_MAX_PEOPLE, A.A_CHARGE, A.S_SITE, A.A_RESERVATION_DEADLINE FROM ACTIVITY_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN SELLER S ON (A.S_ID = S.S_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN ACTIVITY_THEME T ON (A.A_THEME_ID = T.A_THEME_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN REGION_SIGUNGU G ON (A.SIGUNGU_ID = G.SIGUNGU_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN REGION_SIDO D ON (G.SIDO_ID = D.SIDO_ID) WHERE (A.A_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchDTO.keyword}, '%') AND G.SIDO_ID = #{searchDTO.sido} AND A.SIGUNGU_ID = #{searchDTO.sigungu}) OR (A.A_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchDTO.keyword}, '%')) UNION SELECT A.A_ID, A.S_ID, S.S_COM_NAME, A.SIGUNGU_ID, G.SIGUNGU_NAME, G.SIDO_ID, D.SIDO_NAME, A.A_THEME_ID, T.A_THEME_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(A.A_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS A_START_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(A.A_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS A_END_DATE, A.A_ADDR, A.A_NAME, A.A_ONE_LINER, A.A_MIN_PEOPLE, A.A_MAX_PEOPLE, A.A_CHARGE, A.S_SITE, A.A_RESERVATION_DEADLINE FROM ACTIVITY_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN SELLER S ON (A.S_ID = S.S_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN ACTIVITY_THEME T ON (A.A_THEME_ID = T.A_THEME_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN REGION_SIGUNGU G ON (A.SIGUNGU_ID = G.SIGUNGU_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN REGION_SIDO D ON (G.SIDO_ID = D.SIDO_ID) WHERE (G.SIDO_ID = #{searchDTO.sido} AND A.SIGUNGU_ID = #{searchDTO.sigungu} AND A.A_THEME_ID = #{searchDTO.theme} ) OR (G.SIDO_ID = #{searchDTO.sido} AND T.A_THEME_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(A.A_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS A_START_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(A.A_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS A_END_DATE, A.A_ADDR, A.A_NAME, A.A_ONE_LINER, A.A_MIN_PEOPLE, A.A_MAX_PEOPLE,
